# Harold Warren

Harold Ray Warren (born September 7, 1960) is an American former professional boxer in the Welterweight division.[http://boxrec.com/media/index.php/Harold_Warren Harold Warren – Boxrec Boxing Encyclopaedia] He is a former NABF Featherweight, WBC International Super Featherweight and WBO NABO Lightweight champion.[http://boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=3441&cat=boxer Harold Warren – Boxer]
Professional career
Harold destroyed Darryl Pinckney to earn the NABF Featherweight championship.[http://boxrec.com/show_display.php?show_id=18951 BoxRec Boxing Records]
WBA Super Featherweight Championship
In November 1993, he lost a twelve-round decision to WBA Super Featherweight Champion Genaro Hernandez.[http://boxrec.com/show_display.php?show_id=5359 BoxRec Boxing Records]
IBF Super Featherweight Championship
On October 24, 1998, Warren lost to Robert Garcia and his chance at the IBF Super Featherweight Champion, the bout was at the Miccosukee Resort in Miami, Florida.[http://boxrec.com/media/index.php/Roberto_Garcia_vs._Harold_Warren Roberto Garcia vs. Harold Warren – Boxrec Boxing Encyclopaedia]
